title: Gallery Hours
textBeforeTable: . Come visit us, or reach us by phone at 618.893.3100. 102 N. Front Street., Cobden, IL, 62920 Effective July 3, 2013, Anthill Gallery & Vintage Curiosities will be open Wednesday through Saturday from 11 A.M. to 5 P.M., and Sunday from noon to 4 P.M.. The gallery can be found on the wine-trail at Anthill Gallery is closed for the season and will re-open February 19, 2014. See you then!
